content: coage pumpkin tapestry crochet pattern by sara hash | earth hand & fiber © 2025 earth hand & fiber page 1 introduction about materials the cottage pumpkin tapestry is a cozy farmhouse- hooks h/5 mm for tapestry g/4 mm for leaves inspired wall hanging featuring warm autumn tones yarn medium weight yarn of your choice for the and charming 3d leaf appliqués for added texture tapestry pictured in this pattern i used a total of and whimsy this pattern was designed for ~210 yards of the following yarns intermediate crochet artists with knowledge of tapestry crochet using multiple colors the pattern yarn colorway is worked in row of single_crochet stitches starting sugar cookie background 70 yards lion brand white background 50 yards from the bottom at the end of each row you will pound of love pumpkin spice pumpkin 50 yards chain 1 turn your work and continue with the next olive leaves 10 yards row row are marked with rs and ws to indicate loops & the right side display side and wrong side back threads chocolate brown pumpkin outline 27 yards side of your piece impeccable if you have any questions or concerns about this wooden dowel 1/2 or 5/8 inch diameter for pattern please do not hesitate to reach out to me mounting your tapestry you can usually find these sara directly at earthhandandfiber@gmail com at your local craft or hardware store alternatively you can use a tree branch blocking equipment blocking mats blocking pins fabric steamer notions embroidery needle scissors finished size your finished size may vary based on the yarn and hook size you use for the tapestry pictured in this pattern finished size was ~12 x 10 inches abbreviations pattern is written in us crochet terminology chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet dtr double treble_crochet chain 2 then slip_stitch back into the top of the picot original st skip skip 1 stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch earth hand & fiber is supported by other fiber artists like you when rs right side you purchase through links in my patterns i may earn an affiliate ws wrong side commission note that all products linked are products i have used and thoroughly test myself yo yarn over © 2025 earth hand & fiber page 2 pattern notes please read this pattern is worked in row of single_crochet from bottom to top at the end of each row you will chain 1 and turn your work before starting the next row turning chains do not count as a stitch and are not indicated on the stitch charts to follow the pattern you may use either the stitch chart page 4 or the color block instructions pages 5-7 color block instructions are color coded by yarn color if you would like to edit the chart with your own color scheme you may access the chart on stitch fiddle here https //www stitchfiddle com/c/shgbdd-iqcgkp note to make your own edits you will need to make
